Pug.js Demo

Pug.js Docs

General Syntax

main.container //To create an element, type its name w/o the normal HTML brackets. Append classes/ID with "." & "#".
.row //To nest an element in another, space or tab the next line to indent it. You can omit "div" if it has a class.
.col-lg-12.p-5#test //String multiple classes or a single ID together.
div // You do need to write out "div" if it does not have a class.
img(src="test.jpg alt="") "//Attributes (e.g, src, alt, style, etc) are added to elements with parentheses.

Built-in JavaScript Goodness

Iteration ("Each") Ex:
- var numbers = ['one', 'two', 'three']
ul
  each number in numbers
    li= number

EXAMPLE

  • one
  • two
  • three
View more examples in the Docs!
